name: Time To Kill (LowPolyGames)
description:
With a theme of  'Time',  we made 'Time To Kill'. The team was John Weightman, Tim Weightman, Will Dixon, Daniel Dennis and Luke Garside.  This was for CanJam 2018 at the University of Lincoln.

Navigate an abandoned lab, sneaking around a ruthless murdering robot and collecting parts of an EMP, putting an end to his rampage. Uncover the mystery behind what happened to the staff, and how they met their gruesome ends.

Controls:

      *This game only works with a controller!*

       Left Stick - Movement

       Right Stick - Aim

       Right Trigger - Fire

       Bumpers - Change Weapons 

       X - Open Doors
